analysis.description:
BlockChainChallenge.checkDate (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#70-90) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- leader.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#77)

BlockChainChallenge.checkDate (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#70-90) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > (startingTime + gameLength) (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#73-88)

BlockChainChallenge.overthrow (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#90-131) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- challengeHash == leaderHash (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#101-102)
	- (challengeHash ^ leaderHash) > difficulty (/unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#105-106)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#34-36:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/27/0x8b4aa759d83ec43efba755fc27923e4a581bccc1.sol#61-62:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
